body:
Heyy,

So recently I've been thinking about getting my own private server, but... I need a little help. I want to know if the type of host I'm looking at will support my needs. I am currently looking at is the Starter plan from HostHorde which has 1gb RAM and 5gb of memory. Is that enough to support the Essentials plugin and still run at a decent speed? I don't plan on having any other plugins and the playercount will be 1-5. If anyone knows about this type of thing help would be greatly appreciated!

title: Server Hosting Question...

replies.body: Yup works! I used that server for quite some time and it ran smooth most of the time (it was laggy when I did large WE stuff), but maybe instead of hosthorde use their cheaper company "Minespan".
replies.body_tagged: Yup works! I used that server for quite some time and it ran smooth most of the time (it was laggy when I did large WE stuff), but maybe instead of hosthorde use their cheaper company "Minespan".

replies.body: Like I said in OCN slack, it should :p And hosthorde refunds if you ask in the first week :p cmon man, do the research xd
replies.body_tagged: Like I said in OCN slack, it should :p And hosthorde refunds if you ask in the first week :p cmon man, do the research xd

replies.body:
Have you used Minespan? Does it work as well as HostHorde? Also do you know how I get Plugins? xD

-Edit: Do you need to fill out all the address, phone and stuff, or can you just put a fake one? From your experience.

replies.body: The plugins are easy to get, its not much harder than installing a forge mod.
replies.body_tagged: The plugins are easy to get, its not much harder than installing a forge mod.

replies.body:
I used this hosting service. https://triangle.gs/servers

You can get servers from free as long as you renew it every 24 hours, but I have no idea how the pricing compares to other services.
replies.body_tagged:

You can get servers from free as long as you renew it every 24 hours, but I have no idea how the pricing compares to other services.

replies.body:
Using minespan for my server and as far as I know Alex does too. Plugins are really easy to get, there is a point under "files" i think and you can put the plugin name and click on install.
I assume you can put fake details, never received a letter or a call from them...

replies.body: I have been trying to get a free server from them for a month.  I tried doing the short cut to skip the queue but it was stuck on the second step in installing server files.  Finally gave up and let the server expire
replies.body_tagged: I have been trying to get a free server from them for a month.  I tried doing the short cut to skip the queue but it was stuck on the second step in installing server files.  Finally gave up and let the server expire

replies.body:
HostHorde is probably the worst company...they oversell, Minespan is just as bad.

Try giving Shockbyte a shot. I've used them for 1 year and they're great, ticket response times take usually between 10-45 minutes. Their 1gb plan is like $2.50/gb, so they're pretty cheap.

*I'm not an advertiser for them.

Don't use triangle.gs, not to mention their service doesn't even work.
replies.body_tagged:
HostHorde is probably the worst company...they oversell, Minespan is just as bad.

Try giving Shockbyte a shot. I've used them for 1 year and they're great, ticket response times take usually between 10-45 minutes. Their 1gb plan is like $2.50/gb, so they're pretty cheap.

*I'm not an advertiser for them.

Don't use triangle.gs, not to mention their service doesn't even work.

replies.body: BisectHosting is a good host. You can customise your server with approximate plugins, players, etc. They're cheap to some extent too.
replies.body_tagged: BisectHosting is a good host. You can customise your server with approximate plugins, players, etc. They're cheap to some extent too.

replies.body:
Thanks for all the suggestions and feedback on hosts. I'm probably going to with HostHorde because of the dedicated IP.

I have one more question though, other then essentials, which Plugins would I need? And where is the best place to find them, Spigot? Or Bukett?

replies.body: 5gb? dude I hope the OS isn't included or else it's rip for you.
replies.body_tagged: 5gb? dude I hope the OS isn't included or else it's rip for you.

replies.body: Always install Spigot since it is actually Bukkit with more features. ;)

replies.body:
2.5$/gb is cheap... I pay 15€ (~16.5$) for 8gb ram, 100gb memory (or even more than 100, but definitely not beneath 100gb) and fu***** 1gpbs up & download speed


THIS is cheap.

EDIT: Now I pay only 4.5 Euros for 4GB Ram, 200GB and 1000GB bandwith a month (about 5-10% of these 1000GB a month will be used for MusicBot only) and idk 100mbps or more download/upload speed.
